attributes.review: So i decided to download this app to see the reasons why i should vote for our president again this year but, it took 3 1/2 weeks to download and when i opened it played a song that gathered thousands of chickens from my whole town, both dead and alive and how they did that i dont know, to my house and simultaneously, looted my entire house. they even took my shower and toilets. they just picked them up with their big strong chicken arms while i stood there watching them helplessly. and when i tried to exit out of the app, it played an alarm and all the bugs and woodland creatures from my backyard came and started attacking my goldfish. they then sacrificed it to the president ğŸŠ and started chanting something really weird. im still traumatized and scared. i was finally able to delete it. but my therapist doesnâ€™t believe my story. i would not recommend buying this app. something similar happened to my friend, so there is obviously something going on with this app. 0/10 DONT BUY
